rules.rationale: Table prefix 't_physactf_' = physical activity file. Each table contains ~11K variables representing hourly accelerometer count bins from wrist-worn devices. Three tables cover different exam cohorts.
FHS lab naming: 'l_' prefix = lab assay, 'rna' = RNA expression. These contain whole-blood gene expression probe-level data, ~1K vars per table.
FHS lab naming: 'l_olink' = Olink proteomics platform. Olink is a commercial proximity extension assay measuring ~90-3000 protein biomarkers per panel. No matching tables in current download.
FHS lab naming: 'l_mtbl' = metabolomics. Subtypes include 'mtbli' (initial platform), 'mtbllipi' (lipidomics), 'mtblcmhi' (clinical metabolomics). Metabolon/Broad platforms, 50-112 vars per table.
Matched by description containing 'Bone Mineral Density', 'DXA' (dual-energy X-ray absorptiometry), or 'BMD'. Table names like 'bmd0_*' and 'wholedxa0_*' confirmed via descriptions.
rules.description: e.g. 'Bone Mineral Density and Related Measures, Exam 9' and DXA body composition tables
